alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 22 at 2:35PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Valley and Greeley Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Though top end wind gusts will drop off this evening, a steady north to the northwest wind will team with subzero temperatures to result in dangerously cold wind chills tonight and early Wednesday.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
